edu.mhs.compsys.processing

Class Recognizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.mhs.compsys.processing.Recognizer

  • public class Recognizer
extends java.lang.Object
    The class that does all of the work. This class encapsulates all change recognition. It contains generates ArrayList of state transitions in each processing step. It also creates a final report in the string format;
